info.description: This is a api for SAL client/listener/counsellor APIs
info.title: SAL Backend API

get.summary: Get client profile with email, if signed up already

parameters.description: Email of client - to get details, if signed up already
parameters.name: email

post.summary: Add client profile after OTP verified to signup
Book an appointment
Rate the appointment

parameters.description: Content category ID - false if required all
parameters.name: category_id

post.summary: Like content
Create appointment order with client and counsellor
Call after payment is completed for counsellor order

parameters.description: Counsellor ID to get slot details
parameters.name: counsellor_id

parameters.description: Event order ID to get details
parameters.name: order_id

get.summary: Get booked upcoming and past events

post.summary: Book a slot in an event
Call after payment is completed for event order
Create appointment order with client and listener
Call after payment is completed for listener order

parameters.description: Listener ID to get slot details
parameters.name: listener_id

get.summary: Get new access token with refresh token
Get counsellor/listener/therapist list with search filters

parameters.description: Counsellor(1)/Listener(2)/Therapist(4) or dont send if all
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Available on time (0-47 half hour slots), in IST, for the selected date
parameters.name: time

parameters.description: Order by - 1(asc), 2(desc) - should be sent along with sort_by
parameters.name: order_by

parameters.description: Phone number to send OTP - send phone number with 91 code
parameters.name: phone

post.summary: Create appointment order with client and therapist
Call after payment is completed for therapist order

parameters.description: Therapist ID to get slot details
parameters.name: therapist_id

get.summary: Verify OTP sent to specified phone

parameters.description: Phone number OTP has been sent to - send phone number with 91 code
parameters.name: phone

get.summary: Get counsellor profile with email, if signed up already

parameters.description: Email of counsellor - to get details, if signed up already
parameters.name: email

post.summary: Add counsellor profile after OTP verified to signup

parameters.description: Counsellor ID to get availability details
parameters.name: counsellor_id

parameters.description: Counsellor ID to update availability details
parameters.name: counsellor_id

parameters.description: Phone number OTP has been sent to - send phone number with 91 code
parameters.name: phone
